body.p:
121
Aprl 27th 4
Lt Col.
James T. Bramlette
12th Ky Cavl.
Nicholasville, Ky.
Colonel
I have the honor to inclose herein a copy of the reply from the War Department, to the Governors application to have Maj Hamilton mustered from date of commission.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky.
